After paying his time in prison, Michael Vick has gotten a new endorsement. The Philadelphia Eagles' quarterback has signed a deal with Unequal Technologies. The CEO , Rob Vito, of Unequal Technologies said, We're real excited about it. Michael Vick is good people. He paid his dues. Barack Obama reached out to him. He deserves an opportunity. This is what makes America so great. He's moved forward. He's a whole other person. Unequal Technologies are the creators of sports pads.
